document_data.name: Sundaroon's Seatower
document_data.mainbody: '''Sundaroon's Seatower''', also known as '''the Seawall''', was a fortified spire located in the [[Seaglimpse]] neighborhood of [[Ravens Bluff]]. The Seatower gained its name from Sundaroon's Wharf, the dock that joined the seafront fortress to [[Raven Way]], in the [[Harbor District (Ravens Bluff)|Harbor District]], west of the Gates of the Watchful Raven.
document_data.Structure: The Seatower contained a number of naval defenses, including [[catapult|heavy catapults]], [[fire shot]] soaked with [[oil]] and stone balls linked with [[chain]]. The top of the tower also featured an area where [[griffon]]s or other aerial [[mount]]s could land.
document_data.History: Prior to the [[War with Myrkyssa Jelan]], in the year [[1370 DR]],  Sundaroon's Seatower housed the [[Navy of Ravens Bluff|Ravenian navy]].
